text:
He sat in his room, overwhelmed. Thoughts swarmed like bees. 

He tried to focus. Nothing stuck. 

“Why can’t I think?” he muttered, frustration rising. 

He jumped at every sound. 

“Is someone there?” he shouted, heart racing. 

Silence answered him. 

He sank back, exhausted. 

His mind raced, but he couldn’t catch a thought. 

Desperation filled the air.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist is overwhelmed by chaotic thoughts and fatigue, struggling to find clarity and rest.
